pulse_and_breakthrough_experiments.equipment: 5-cm stainless-steel column placed in an HPLC apparatus

gas_phase_adsorption.equipment: 15-cm column packed with pellets of MIL-47

selectivities_and_adsorption_constants.additional_information: Further details about procedures and calculations of selectivities, Henry adsorption constants, and adsorption enthalpies are given in the Supporting Information.

rietveld_refinements.additional_information: Rietveld refinements are described in more detail in the Supporting Information.
